name: Telescope
description: Telescope is an AI sales assistant that performs prospecting on auto-pilot. Telescope offers a revolutionary SaaS platform that performs B2B cold outreach on auto-pilot. By analysing billions of data points, it finds the right prospect for the right product at the right time and reaches out automatically with a personalised message. Using machine learning techniques, it quickly learns the userâ€™s ideal client profile and becomes more intelligent over time. Telescope enables salespeople to spend less time prospecting for new clients, so they can instead focus on closing deals.
